Faculty Guide
  • IITM Main Web Page
  1. Responsibilities & Career Progression
  2. FAP

Faculty academic profile

The Faculty Academic Profile is for faculty to update academic data and achievements annually. This data is used by the Insitute to track achievements for high level positions. The reports created from the submitted FAP data can be viewed at https://workflowreports.iitm.ac.in/ HumanResources FAP

It is mandatory to fill this and the data will be used during career progress through MBS (merit based selection).
